underlying_goal: To systematically address all remaining feedback items from a large comment document by applying them to the main.tex source file using a parallelized, multi-agent approach.
primary_success: Successfully using a multi-agent 'map-reduce' style workflow to parallelize the processing of dozens of edits on a single file, demonstrating an advanced and efficient way to handle bulk feedback.
brief_summary: The user invoked the /bulk-edit skill to address a large number of outstanding comments on a LaTeX paper. Claude orchestrated a multi-agent workflow, spawning seven parallel agents to work on different sections of the paper simultaneously. After the agents completed their edits, Claude verified that all comments were addressed and committed the changes.
